projectAuthor: Philippine Science High School Main Campus

content.title: Description
content.text: Surface color is determined by the amount of light reflected off a surface. This circuit should return relative red, green, and blue light levels reflected off an area.

content.title: Materials
text: Intel Galileo with color sensor circuit
3" Ã— 3" cut illustration board (or equivalent cardboard piece that is black on one side, white on the other)
Various colored materials, with different surface types (e.g. matte vs. glossy)

content.title: Author
content.text: Jason Alcarez, Kelvin Bartilad, Ralph Benedict Bucao
